quote_zh: “十七岁，啊！”海格接过弗雷德递给他的一桶酒，说道。“六年前我们见面的那一天，哈利，你还记得吗？”“模糊地，”哈利对他咧嘴一笑。“你不是砸了前门，给了达力一条猪尾巴，告诉我我是个巫师吗？”海格笑着说：“我伪造了细节。”
quote_en:
“Seventeen, eh!" said Hagrid as he accepted a bucket-sized glass of wine from Fred."Six years to the day we met, Harry, d’yeh remember it?""Vaguely," said Harry, grinning up at him. "Didn’t you smash down the front door, give Dudley a pig’s tail, and tell me I was a wizard?""I forge’ the details," Hagrid chortled.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “所有人都会犯错。决定一个人性格的不是我们犯的错误。而是我们如何把这些错误变成教训，而不是借口。”
quote_en:
“All humans make mistakes. What determines a person's character aren't the mistakes we make. It's how we take those mistakes and turn them into lessons rather than excuses.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “如果你试图失败，却成功了，你做了什么？”
quote_en:
“If you try to fail, and succeed, which have you done?”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我知道有些人经常在书上喝醉，就像其他人喝威士忌一样。”
quote_en:
“I know some who are constantly drunk on books as other men are drunk on whiskey.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “生活就像一个棱镜。你看到的取决于你如何转动玻璃。”
quote_en:
“Life is like a prism. What you see depends on how you turn the glass.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “威胁是一个没有词汇的人的最后手段。”
quote_en:
“Threats are the last resort of a man with no vocabulary.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我们是宇宙之旅中的旅行者，星尘在无尽的漩涡中旋转和跳舞。生命是永恒的。我们停下来片刻，彼此相遇、相遇、相爱、分享。这是一个珍贵的时刻。这是永恒中的一个小插曲。”
quote_en:
“We are travelers on a cosmic journey,stardust,swirling and dancing in the eddies and whirlpools of infinity. Life is eternal. We have stopped for a moment to encounter each other, to meet, to love, to share.This is a precious moment. It is a little parenthesis in eternity.”
    
  ―

“I restore myself when I'm alone.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我祖母六十岁时开始每天走五英里。她现在九十七岁了，我们不知道她到底在哪里。”
quote_en:
“My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the heck she is.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “幸福是通过我们甚至不记得敞开的门进入我们生活的东西。”
quote_en:
“Happiness is something that comes into our lives through doors we don't even remember leaving open.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “把一个抑郁的人当作悲伤的人来对待是没有意义的，她说，‘现在，等等，你会好起来的。’悲伤或多或少就像感冒——只要有耐心，它就会过去。抑郁就像癌症。”
quote_en:
“There is no point treating a depressed person as though she were just feeling sad, saying, 'There now, hang on, you'll get over it.' Sadness is more or less like a head cold- with patience, it passes. Depression is like cancer.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “生活不是模仿艺术，而是模仿糟糕的电视。”
quote_en:
“Life doesn't imitate art, it imitates bad television.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我喜欢一朵花或一小丛草从混凝土的裂缝里长出来。这太他妈的英雄了。”
quote_en:
“I like it when a flower or a little tuft of grass grows through a crack in the concrete. It's so fuckin' heroic.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “春天是计划和项目的时候。”
quote_en:
“Spring is the time of plans and projects.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我不受精神错乱的折磨——我享受其中的每一分钟。”
quote_en:
“I don't suffer from my insanity -- I enjoy every minute of it.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “狗是我们通往天堂的纽带。它们不知道邪恶、嫉妒或不满。在一个美好的下午，和狗坐在山坡上，就像回到了伊甸园，在那里什么都不做并不无聊，而是平静。”
quote_en:
“Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring--it was peace.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “困难中蕴藏着机遇”
quote_en:
“In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “世上没有什么能弥补失去一个爱你的人。”
quote_en:
“Nothing on earth can make up for the loss of one who has loved you.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我会一直坚持下去，直到我成功——或者死去。别以为我不知道这会如何结束。我已经知道很多年了。”
quote_en:
“I'm going to keep going until I succeed — or die. Don't think I don't know how this might end. I've known it for years.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “无论你做什么，你都需要勇气。无论你决定走哪条路，总有人会告诉你你错了。总会有困难出现，让你相信批评你的人是对的。制定行动方案并坚持到底需要一些与士兵所需的勇气相同的勇气。和平有胜利，但需要勇敢的男女才能赢得胜利。”
quote_en:
“Whatever you do, you need courage. Whatever course you decide upon, there is always someone to tell you that you are wrong. There are always difficulties arising that tempt you to believe your critics are right. To map out a course of action and follow it to an end requires some of the same courage that a soldier needs. Peace has its victories, but it takes brave men and women to win them.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我们在里面的年龄总是一样的。”
quote_en:
“We are always the same age inside. ”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “如果我有个女儿……”她不会叫我“妈妈”，而是叫我“B点”。因为这样，她知道无论发生什么，至少她总能找到我。我要在她的手背上画太阳系，这样她就必须学习整个宇宙，然后才能说“哦，我知道这就像我的手背一样。”她会明白，生活会狠狠地打你的脸，等你站起来，这样它就会踢你的肚子。但让风从你身上吹走是提醒你的肺部有多喜欢空气味道的唯一方法。这里有伤害，无法用创可贴或诗歌来修复，所以当她第一次意识到神奇女侠不会来的时候，我会确保她知道她不必一个人穿斗篷。因为无论你把手指伸得多宽，你的手总是太小，无法承受你想要治愈的所有疼痛。相信我，我试过了。还有“宝贝，”我会告诉她“别那样高着头，我知道这个把戏，你只是在闻烟味，这样你就可以沿着小路回到一座燃烧的房子，这样你就能找到在火灾中失去一切的男孩，看看你能不能救他。否则，先找到生火的男孩，看你能不能改变他。”但我知道她无论如何都会改变的，所以我会一直在附近多放一些巧克力和雨船，因为没有巧克力不能解决的心碎。好吧，有些心碎是巧克力无法弥补的。但这就是雨靴的用途，因为如果你让雨水冲走一切。我想让她透过玻璃底船的底面看世界，透过放大镜看存在于人类心灵深处的星系。因为我妈妈就是这么教我的。会有这样的日子，“我妈妈说，”当你张开双手去抓的时候，结果只会起水泡和擦伤。当你走出电话亭试图飞翔时，你想救的人正是站在你斗篷上的人。当你的靴子里充满了雨水，你会失望地跪下，在那些日子里，你更有理由说“谢谢”，因为没有什么比大海拒绝停止亲吻海岸线的方式更美丽的了，无论它被送走了多少次。你会把“风”放在赢一些输一些上，把“星”放在一遍又一遍的开始上，无论一分钟内有多少地雷爆炸，都要确保你的头脑落在这个被称为生活的有趣地方的美丽上。是的，从一到过度信任，我非常天真，但我想让她知道这个世界是由糖组成的。它很容易碎，但不要害怕伸出舌头品尝它。“宝贝，”我会告诉她，“记住你妈妈是个多愁善感的人，但你爸爸是个战士，你是个小手大眼睛的女孩，永远不会停止要求更多。”记住，好事有三样，所以做坏事，当你做错了事时，一定要道歉，但永远不要为你的眼睛不停地发光而道歉。你的声音很小，但永远不要停止唱歌，当他们终于把心碎交给你，把仇恨和战争放在你家门口，把愤世嫉俗和失败的街角交给你时，你告诉他们他们真的应该见见你的母亲。”
quote_en:
“If I should have a daughter…“Instead of “Mom”, she’s gonna call me “Point B.” Because that way, she knows that no matter what happens, at least she can always find her way to me. And I’m going to paint the solar system on the back of her hands so that she has to learn the entire universe before she can say “Oh, I know that like the back of my hand.”She’s gonna learn that this life will hit you, hard, in the face, wait for you to get back up so it can kick you in the stomach. But getting the wind knocked out of you is the only way to remind your lungs how much they like the taste of air. There is hurt, here, that cannot be fixed by band-aids or poetry, so the first time she realizes that Wonder-woman isn’t coming, I’ll make sure she knows she doesn’t have to wear the cape all by herself. Because no matter how wide you stretch your fingers, your hands will always be too small to catch all the pain you want to heal. Believe me, I’ve tried.And “Baby,” I’ll tell her “don’t keep your nose up in the air like that, I know that trick, you’re just smelling for smoke so you can follow the trail back to a burning house so you can find the boy who lost everything in the fire to see if you can save him. Or else, find the boy who lit the fire in the first place to see if you can change him.”But I know that she will anyway, so instead I’ll always keep an extra supply of chocolate and rain boats nearby, ‘cause there is no heartbreak that chocolate can’t fix. Okay, there’s a few heartbreaks chocolate can’t fix. But that’s what the rain boots are for, because rain will wash away everything if you let it.I want her to see the world through the underside of a glass bottom boat, to look through a magnifying glass at the galaxies that exist on the pin point of a human mind. Because that’s how my mom taught me. That there’ll be days like this, “There’ll be days like this my momma said” when you open your hands to catch and wind up with only blisters and bruises. When you step out of the phone booth and try to fly and the very people you wanna save are the ones standing on your cape. When your boots will fill with rain and you’ll be up to your knees in disappointment and those are the very days you have all the more reason to say “thank you,” ‘cause there is nothing more beautiful than the way the ocean refuses to stop kissing the shoreline no matter how many times it’s sent away.You will put the “wind” in win some lose some, you will put the “star” in starting over and over, and no matter how many land mines erupt in a minute be sure your mind lands on the beauty of this funny place called life.And yes, on a scale from one to over-trusting I am pretty damn naive but I want her to know that this world is made out of sugar. It can crumble so easily but don’t be afraid to stick your tongue out and taste it.“Baby,” I’ll tell her “remember your mama is a worrier but your papa is a warrior and you are the girl with small hands and big eyes who never stops asking for more.”Remember that good things come in threes and so do bad things and always apologize when you’ve done something wrong but don’t you ever apologize for the way your eyes refuse to stop shining.Your voice is small but don’t ever stop singing and when they finally hand you heartbreak, slip hatred and war under your doorstep and hand you hand-outs on street corners of cynicism and defeat, you tell them that they really ought to meet your mother.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “寻求自由，成为欲望的俘虏。寻求纪律，找到自由。”
quote_en:
“Seek freedom and become captive of your desires. Seek discipline and find your liberty.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “生命的奥秘不是一个需要解决的问题，而是一个需要体验的现实。”
quote_en:
“The mystery of life isn't a problem to solve, but a reality to experience.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “明确历史上大多数伟大的胜利和悲剧不是由人从根本上是好的或根本上是坏的造成的，而是由人从本质上是人造成的，这可能有助于理解人类事务。”
quote_en:
“It may help to understand human affairs to be clear that most of the great triumphs and tragedies of history are caused, not by people being fundamentally good or fundamentally bad, but by people being fundamentally people.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我握紧他的手，疼得要命。”和我呆在一起。“他的瞳孔收缩以精确定位，再次快速拨号，然后恢复到类似正常的状态。”他喃喃自语道
quote_en:
“I clench his hands to the point of pain. "Stay with me."His pupils contract to pinpoints, dialate again rapidly, and then return to something resembling normalcy. "Always," he murmurs.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “永远不要试图教猪唱歌；这会浪费你的时间，惹恼猪。”
quote_en:
“Never attempt to teach a pig to sing; it wastes your time and annoys the pig.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “如果我们听从自己的理智，我们就永远不会有爱情。我们永远不会有友谊。我们永远也不会做生意，因为我们会愤世嫉俗：“会出错的。”或者“她会伤害我。”或者，“我有过几次糟糕的恋情，所以……”好吧，这是无稽之谈。你会错过生活。你必须一直跳下悬崖，在坠落的路上长出翅膀。”
quote_en:
“If we listened to our intellect we'd never have a love affair. We'd never have a friendship. We'd never go in business because we'd be cynical: "It's gonna go wrong." Or "She's going to hurt me." Or,"I've had a couple of bad love affairs, so therefore . . ." Well, that's nonsense. You're going to miss life. You've got to jump off the cliff all the time and build your wings on the way down.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “世界的一半是由有话要说却不能说的人组成的，另一半是无话可说却一直说下去的人。”
quote_en:
“Half the world is composed of people who have something to say and can't, and the other half who have nothing to say and keep on saying it.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “人们很容易忘记世界上的人是多么的充实，充实到崩溃，他们中的每一个人都是可以想象的，而且总是被误解。”
quote_en:
“It is easy to forget how full the world is of people, full to bursting, and each of them imaginable and consistently misimagined.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “好吧，如果我想熟悉蝴蝶，我必须忍受几只毛毛虫的存在。”
quote_en:
“Well, I must endure the presence of a few caterpillars if I wish to become acquainted with the butterflies.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我和上帝说话，但天空是空的。”
quote_en:
“I talk to God but the sky is empty.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “生活的一个深刻秘密是，所有真正值得做的事情都是我们为他人做的事情。”
quote_en:
“One of the deep secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “一个人应该每天听一点音乐，读一点诗歌，看一幅美好的画面，这样世俗的忧虑就不会抹杀上帝植入人类灵魂的美丽感。”
quote_en:
“A man should hear a little music, read a little poetry, and see a fine picture every day of his life, in order that worldly cares may not obliterate the sense of the beautiful which God has implanted in the human soul.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “一个有时让我困惑的问题：是我还是其他人疯了？”
quote_en:
“A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “如果你让人们进入你的生活，他们可能会非常惊人。”
quote_en:
“If you let people into your life a little bit, they can be pretty damn amazing.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “亲爱的伊内杰，我心中的宝贝，你能不能给我买一顶新帽子？”
quote_en:
“Please, my darling Inej, treasure of my heart, won’t you do me the honor of acquiring me a new hat?”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “每个深刻的思想家都更害怕被理解，而不是被误解。”
quote_en:
“Every deep thinker is more afraid of being understood than of being misunderstood.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “有些东西更珍贵，因为它们不会持续太久。”
quote_en:
“Some things are more precious because they don't last long.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “激励自己。不要安定下来。好好生活。好好生活吧。”
quote_en:
“Push yourself. Don't Settle. Just live well. Just LIVE.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我们谁也不知道下一分钟会发生什么，但我们仍然继续前进。因为我们信任。因为我们有信心。”
quote_en:
“None of us knows what might happen even the next minute, yet still we go forward. Because we trust. Because we have faith.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我唯一的爱源于我唯一的恨！太早看到未知，知道得太晚！对我来说，这是爱的神奇诞生，我必须爱一个令人厌恶的敌人。”
quote_en:
“My only love sprung from my only hate!Too early seen unknown, and known too late!Prodigious birth of love it is to me,That I must love a loathed enemy.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “一般来说，人们都很糟糕。”
quote_en:
“People, generally, suck.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “我们最真实的一面是我们创造、克服、忍受、改变、爱和超越痛苦的能力。”
quote_en:
“The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “一个人是什么，如果不是他们留下的痕迹呢？”
quote_en:
“What is a person, if not the marks they leave behind?”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “质疑一切。你的爱、你的宗教、你的激情。如果你没有问题，你永远找不到答案。”
quote_en:
“Question everything. Your love, your religion, your passion. If you don't have questions, you'll never find answers.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “让别人远离你，拒绝自己的爱，这并不能让你变得坚强。如果有的话，它会让你变得更弱。因为你这样做是出于恐惧。”
quote_en:
“Holding people away from you, and denying yourself love, that doesn't make you strong. if anything, it makes you weaker. Because you're doing it out of fear.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “如果我们没有和平，那是因为我们忘记了我们属于彼此。”
quote_en:
“If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.”
    
  ―

quote_zh: “你认为我们所爱的死者真的离开了我们吗？你认为我们在遇到大麻烦时不会更清楚地回忆起他们吗？”
quote_en:
“You think the dead we loved ever truly leave us? You think that we don't recall them more clearly in times of great trouble?”
    
  ―
